metadata.title: CVE-2024-42278 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:ASoC: TAS2781: Fix tasdev_load_calibrated_data()This function has a reversed if statement so it's either a no-op or itleads to a NULL dereference.

criterions.comment: linux package in noble is affected and needs fixing.
